scripts.start: (go run server.go &) && (npm run watch &) && open http://localhost:8080
scripts.build: cp -r assets ./dist && node-sass src/style.scss dist/style.css && cp src/index.html ./dist && esbuild ./src/**/*.ts ./src/*.ts ./src/**/**/*.ts --outdir=./dist --bundle --minify
scripts.watch: node-sass src/style.scss dist/style.css && cp src/index.html ./dist && esbuild ./src/**/*.ts ./src/*.ts --outdir=./dist --watch --bundle --minify
